data.text: @hodansomali Werenâ€™t all non Ukrainians advised to get out 2-3 weeks ago. What are they still doing there ??

@HARZ97485790 @Nathankihikire5 @nathan_byanyima @hodansomali Even at the train station, what they were told was: 

Regardles of your gender or age 'if you're black, you should walk'

@HARZ97485790 @nathan_byanyima @hodansomali @AlanRMacLeod Well, how do you explain this👇🏻then? There are many more info coming also from MSM admitting the racism in Ukraine. Again I am sure you know all

@Nathankihikire5 @HARZ97485790 @yohaatt @nathan_byanyima @hodansomali No Ukranian male 18-60 can leave Ukraine, they must stay and fight for their Country.

But Afrikan Blacks are running like frightened children.

@HARZ97485790 @yohaatt @nathan_byanyima @hodansomali What are u defending Mr? That lacks are not drawn back at the boarders? We don't say Ukraine is a racist country, we say Blacks are are treated differently by Ukrainian neighbours like Poland, and besides, there are black women with kids too.
@HARZ97485790 @yohaatt @hodansomali This is all u can respond! I think this just an empty argument, never argue with some1 who isn't ready to understand or learn..never.
@GwithanX @bosolo_m @hodansomali 😀😀 you hate UN, I can see...

@HARZ97485790 @bosolo_m @hodansomali I stopped reading once you brought UN into the equation. How do we depend on an organization that can be vetoed by a perpetrator with a permanent seat in UNSC? Open your mind more, this is more of a human approach, not imagined protocol
